<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="26,-2725.5 26,-2857.5 399,-2857.5 399,-2725.5 26,-2725.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="43" y="-2840.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay. So, yesterday [crosstalk 00:00:47] when</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="32" y="-2825.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> we began with our board work at the beginning, I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="36.5" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> asked you all to write down a title for chapter 1.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="53" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> We looked at the book and saw there are no</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="47" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> numbers, there are no titles for the chapters,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="57" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> so let's share some of those different titles</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="38.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and why you thought that would be a great title</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="137" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> for the first chapter.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="25,-2857.5 25,-2857.5 400,-2857.5 400,-2857.5 25,-2857.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24.5,-2725 24.5,-2886 399.5,-2886 399.5,-2725 24.5,-2725"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="1253.5" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I said "Beginning of The End", because</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="1671.5" y="-2350.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I said Little did you know because at the</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="1653" y="-2122.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I put "A Different Side of The Story", because</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="1635" y="-2107.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> when the holocaust was happening, Germans were</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="1650" y="-2092.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> convincing people that Jews were the downfall</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="1639.5" y="-2077.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and the reason why everything was going bad. So</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="1641" y="-2062.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> then once we started to hear his side of the story</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="1669" y="-2047.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> then we could fully understand the whole</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="1789.5" y="-2032.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> picture.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="8734" y="-2414.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 31 - STUDENT 4</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8772" y="-2399.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="8630,-2273 8630,-2390 9009,-2390 9009,-2273 8630,-2273"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8667" y="-2372.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I said "Disbelief Quickly Becomes Belief",</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8636" y="-2357.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because when Moshe was warning people that the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8641.5" y="-2342.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Gestapo were in the woods killing people, no one</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8657" y="-2327.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> believes him and they say that he just wants</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8647.5" y="-2312.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pity; but then not long after the German troops</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8661.5" y="-2297.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> move into their town and they start getting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8782.5" y="-2282.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> deported.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="8629,-2390 8629,-2390 9010,-2390 9010,-2390 8629,-2390"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="8628.5,-2272.5 8628.5,-2433.5 9009.5,-2433.5 9009.5,-2272.5 8628.5,-2272.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="10485" y="-2825.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Non-fiction? Okay and when you worked on</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10492" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> non-fiction, what it the importance of this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10481.5" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> work being a work of fiction? What were the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10490.5" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> people that were talking about non-fiction</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10469" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yesterday, what were the sort of things that you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10624.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> had?</text>

<title>32</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="9823,-2910.5 9823,-2937.5 10207,-2937.5 10207,-2910.5 9823,-2910.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9936.5" y="-2920.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 32 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="9823,-2673.5 9823,-2910.5 10207,-2910.5 10207,-2673.5 9823,-2673.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9856.5" y="-2893.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> So you see the different people in a state of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9870.5" y="-2878.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> disbelief. Yeah, I love all these different</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9854" y="-2863.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> titles, you guys really captured a lot of what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9863" y="-2848.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was in that first section. So, I think that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9855.5" y="-2833.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> really an interesting thing to think about as</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9854" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you go through this text. Each chapter, they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9829" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't have a name, but as you read, to sort of some</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9865.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> up in your mind, what is the focus of this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9864.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> chapter? And you really got a lot of great</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9857" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> information out there. So when you worked</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9859.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yesterday, in your small groups, this is our</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9870.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> first discussion on Night. So let's talk a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9866.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> little bit about how we're discussing this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9838.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> book. What was the genre that we were using to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9942" y="-2683.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> describe this work?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="9822,-2910.5 9822,-2910.5 10208,-2910.5 10208,-2910.5 9822,-2910.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="9822,-2672.5 9822,-2938.5 10208,-2938.5 10208,-2672.5 9822,-2672.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="9440" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yeah and it ends with- the chapter ends, right?</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9459" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> With them leaving as well. So "Expelled".</text>

<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="11697,-2740.5 11697,-2827.5 12046,-2827.5 12046,-2740.5 11697,-2740.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11703" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> We said that why Elie Wiesel using non-fiction</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11734.5" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> for Night it helped people realize and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11714.5" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> understand what actually went on and how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11721" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> horrific it is and trying to prevent it from</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11807.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happening again.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11696,-2827.5 11696,-2827.5 12047,-2827.5 12047,-2827.5 11696,-2827.5"/>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11886,-2383 11886,-2425 12258,-2425 12258,-2383 11886,-2383"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11982" y="-2407.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 37 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12024.5" y="-2392.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11886,-2281 11886,-2383 12258,-2383 12258,-2281 11886,-2281"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11904.5" y="-2365.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Our group, we had non-fiction versus fictional</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11918.5" y="-2350.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and for it being non-fiction it was realistic</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11911" y="-2335.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and you could actually relate to him and the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11900.5" y="-2320.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> other Jewish people because it was events that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11892" y="-2305.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> actually happened and occurred and happened to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12049" y="-2290.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> them.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11885,-2383 11885,-2383 12259,-2383 12259,-2383 11885,-2383"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="11885,-2280 11885,-2426 12259,-2426 12259,-2280 11885,-2280"/>

<title>38</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11890,-2133 11890,-2175 12255,-2175 12255,-2133 11890,-2133"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11982.5" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 38 - STUDENT 11</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12025" y="-2142.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11890,-2031 11890,-2133 12255,-2133 12255,-2031 11890,-2031"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11898" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> When it's fiction and you know it's made up you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11896" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> tend to read and just kind of overlook it because</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11905.5" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you know it's not real, but when you know it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11917.5" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> non-fiction you, kind of, put yourself in the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11910" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> characters shoes and see what they're going</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12039" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> through.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11889,-2133 11889,-2133 12256,-2133 12256,-2133 11889,-2133"/>

<!-- 40 -->
<g id="node76" class="node">
<title>40</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11492,-2368 11492,-2410 11850,-2410 11850,-2368 11492,-2368"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11581" y="-2392.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 40 - STUDENT 13</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11623.5" y="-2377.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11492,-2296 11492,-2368 11850,-2368 11850,-2296 11492,-2296"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11519" y="-2350.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I would say that Elie Wiesel's purpose for</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11504" y="-2335.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> writing Night is to inform readers about what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11498" y="-2320.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happened during the events of the holocaust so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11584.5" y="-2305.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it never happens again.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11491,-2368 11491,-2368 11851,-2368 11851,-2368 11491,-2368"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="11491,-2295 11491,-2411 11851,-2411 11851,-2295 11491,-2295"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="11581.5" y="-2134.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 41 - STUDENT 20</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11624" y="-2119.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11498,-2053 11498,-2110 11845,-2110 11845,-2053 11498,-2053"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11506.5" y="-2092.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> And adding to what he said, He also wants to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11504" y="-2077.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> persuade the audience so it would not happen</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11647" y="-2062.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> again.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11497,-2110 11497,-2110 11846,-2110 11846,-2110 11497,-2110"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="12880" y="-1623.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> To persuade. So, when you were talking about</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12893.5" y="-1608.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> author's pur- okay. So, in addition to being</text>

<g id="node79" class="node">
<title>39</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="12479,-1655.5 12479,-1682.5 12837,-1682.5 12837,-1655.5 12479,-1655.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12579.5" y="-1665.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 39 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="12479,-1568.5 12479,-1655.5 12837,-1655.5 12837,-1568.5 12479,-1568.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12485" y="-1638.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yeah, I like those responses. So the reason why</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12486" y="-1623.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it may have been non-fiction. So, what was the,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12489.5" y="-1608.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> when we were thinking about this, what is the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12498.5" y="-1593.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> author's purpose? Do you think having it be</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11481,-1898 11481,-1940 11861,-1940 11861,-1898 11481,-1898"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11581" y="-1922.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 48 - STUDENT 22</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11623.5" y="-1907.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11481,-1766 11481,-1898 11861,-1898 11861,-1766 11481,-1766"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11487" y="-1880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> We said it was both a autobiography and a memoir</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11514.5" y="-1865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because since the writer of the story is the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11507" y="-1850.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> narrator who was explaining what happened,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11498" y="-1835.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that's what makes it be an autobiography and a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11496" y="-1820.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> memoir because it's just about a certain time or</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11521" y="-1805.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it's a historical account so it's describing</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11508.5" y="-1790.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what happened during the holocaust and it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11589" y="-1775.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> from his point of view.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11480,-1898 11480,-1898 11862,-1898 11862,-1898 11480,-1898"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="11480,-1765 11480,-1941 11862,-1941 11862,-1765 11480,-1765"/>
</g>

<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="15843,-2850.5 15843,-2892.5 16227,-2892.5 16227,-2850.5 15843,-2850.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15949.5" y="-2875.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 51 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16015.5" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="15843,-2718.5 15843,-2850.5 16227,-2850.5 16227,-2718.5 15843,-2718.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15867.5" y="-2833.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think it, kind of, shows that he's just one out</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15858" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of many who went through this and you can only</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15864.5" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> tell a part of the actual story, because so many</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15895" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> different people had so many different</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15849" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> experiences in the camps and he can only show his</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15866.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> point of view, but people went through a lot to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15857.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> help us to learn and make sure it doesn't happen</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16010.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> again.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="15842,-2850.5 15842,-2850.5 16228,-2850.5 16228,-2850.5 15842,-2850.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="15842,-2717.5 15842,-2893.5 16228,-2893.5 16228,-2717.5 15842,-2717.5"/>

<!-- 67 -->
<g id="node101" class="node">
<title>67</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16406,-1207.5 16406,-1249.5 16764,-1249.5 16764,-1207.5 16406,-1207.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16495" y="-1232.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 67 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16537.5" y="-1217.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16406,-1120.5 16406,-1207.5 16764,-1207.5 16764,-1120.5 16406,-1120.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16412" y="-1190.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> He doesn't want to make a mistake and ask the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16412" y="-1175.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wrong questions and offend someone, if that be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16418" y="-1160.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> his father or anyone in his family. Some of the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16413" y="-1145.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questions could be "Why are Jews getting their</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16432.5" y="-1130.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> stuff taken, why are they getting taken?".</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16405,-1207.5 16405,-1207.5 16765,-1207.5 16765,-1207.5 16405,-1207.5"/>

</g>

<!-- 69 -->
<g id="node102" class="node">
<title>69</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16389,-1018 16389,-1060 16782,-1060 16782,-1018 16389,-1018"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16500" y="-1042.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 69 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16538" y="-1027.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16389,-856 16389,-1018 16782,-1018 16782,-856 16389,-856"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16420" y="-1000.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think it’s necessarily about asking the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16447.5" y="-985.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wrong questions, but asking the right</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16419" y="-970.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questions to get the right answers. like that’s</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16426" y="-955.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what makes it so dramatic. Seeing all these</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16428" y="-940.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> things that he saw, I think he's questioning</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16422" y="-925.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> everything and that includes his religion and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16415.5" y="-910.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because he doesn't believe and because you're</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16419" y="-895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> not supposed to question he's struggling with</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16395" y="-880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that and he wants to ask why but he doesn't want to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16431.5" y="-865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> go against his religion, go against himself.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16388,-1018 16388,-1018 16783,-1018 16783,-1018 16388,-1018"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16387.5,-855 16387.5,-1061 16782.5,-1061 16782.5,-855 16387.5,-855"/>
</g>

<!-- 71 -->
<g id="node103" class="node">
<title>71</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16395,-767.5 16395,-809.5 16776,-809.5 16776,-767.5 16395,-767.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16495.5" y="-792.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 71 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16538" y="-777.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16395,-620.5 16395,-767.5 16776,-767.5 16776,-620.5 16395,-620.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16437.5" y="-750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that it's not unnatural- forgetting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16417" y="-735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about the holocaust like just as a normal teen.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16427.5" y="-720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Like they question a lot about their life and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16426" y="-705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what they've been taught, so I don't believe</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16414" y="-690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questioning his god was wrong for him to do, it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16420" y="-675.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was more natural for him to do, but given the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16427.5" y="-660.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> situation with the holocaust too, I think it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16401" y="-645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> even more apparent for him to question the god as</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16568.5" y="-630.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> well</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16394,-767.5 16394,-767.5 16777,-767.5 16777,-767.5 16394,-767.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16393.5,-620 16393.5,-811 16776.5,-811 16776.5,-620 16393.5,-620"/>
</g>

<!-- 72 -->
<g id="node104" class="node">
<title>72</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16401,-532.5 16401,-574.5 16769,-574.5 16769,-532.5 16401,-532.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16499.5" y="-557.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 72 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16537.5" y="-542.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16401,-415.5 16401,-532.5 16769,-532.5 16769,-415.5 16401,-415.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16423.5" y="-515.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think him questioning his god really shows</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16407" y="-500.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> just how big the holocaust was, I guess. Because</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16418" y="-485.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he was so religious he didn't want to question</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16427" y="-470.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> anything but once it was happening he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16433.5" y="-455.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questioning it. In the introduction he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16422" y="-440.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> almost losing faith because of how terrible it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16574" y="-425.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> is.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16400,-532.5 16400,-532.5 16770,-532.5 16770,-532.5 16400,-532.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16400,-415 16400,-576 16770,-576 16770,-415 16400,-415"/>
</g>

<title>72--71</title>

</g>
<!-- 73 -->
<g id="node105" class="node">
<title>73</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16290,-328 16290,-370 16675,-370 16675,-328 16290,-328"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16392.5" y="-352.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 73 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16435" y="-337.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16290,-226 16290,-328 16675,-328 16675,-226 16290,-226"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16334.5" y="-310.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think he's questioning it all because he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16296" y="-295.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> believes that God would not do him wrong and that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16310" y="-280.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> everything that he's giving is for a purpose and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16308.5" y="-265.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that's what God has sent him through. It's what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16335" y="-250.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he's putting him through, but he doesn't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16311.5" y="-235.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> understand why he's putting him through that.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16289,-328 16289,-328 16676,-328 16676,-328 16289,-328"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16288.5,-225 16288.5,-371 16675.5,-371 16675.5,-225 16288.5,-225"/>
</g>

<!-- 75 -->
<g id="node106" class="node">
<title>75</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16707,-130.5 16707,-172.5 17073,-172.5 17073,-130.5 16707,-130.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16800" y="-155.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 75 - STUDENT 10</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16842.5" y="-140.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16707,-28.5 16707,-130.5 17073,-130.5 17073,-28.5 16707,-28.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16716.5" y="-113.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think when you spend your life living one way,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16736.5" y="-98.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> believing in all the things that you believe</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16713" y="-83.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> since a young age especially for his age when he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16725" y="-68.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was twelve to fifteen, He definitely questions</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16293" y="-120.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think it was hard for him to even think about how</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16297" y="-75.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that, throw babies up in the air and shoot them as</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16316" y="-45.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yes, they have free will, but are they using it</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19211.5" y="-2875.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 78 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="19110,-2718.5 19110,-2865.5 19470,-2865.5 19470,-2718.5 19110,-2718.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19120" y="-2848.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I like how you brought up that this is- that you</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19128.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> in this first section that make Elie relatable,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19123" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> in addition to the questions. What else did we</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19226.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> learn about Elie?</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="18299" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What do you guys think about that? You know from</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="17916.5" y="-2833.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay, I think that's some questions that may</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17910" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> come up later, right? And those are the kind of</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="17911.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> interesting in this section how you brought up</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17916.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that in this beginning section we learn about</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="17916.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> how questioning might be important to us as</text>

<!-- 79 -->

<title>79</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="19995,-2835.5 19995,-2877.5 20378,-2877.5 20378,-2835.5 19995,-2835.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20101" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 79 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20167" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="19995,-2733.5 19995,-2835.5 20378,-2835.5 20378,-2733.5 19995,-2733.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20003.5" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't know how much we can relate to Elie and I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20012" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't know if that's what we should do, because</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20001" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> by watching him and seeing what he goes through,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20011.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that's what the author's purpose was. So</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20017" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> we don't relate, so we don't have to relate. It’s</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20083" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> so we know what happened.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="19994,-2835.5 19994,-2835.5 20379,-2835.5 20379,-2835.5 19994,-2835.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="19993.5,-2732.5 19993.5,-2878.5 20378.5,-2878.5 20378.5,-2732.5 19993.5,-2732.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 81 -->
<g id="node118" class="node">
<title>81</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="19995,-2390 19995,-2432 20377,-2432 20377,-2390 19995,-2390"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20100.5" y="-2414.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 81 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20138.5" y="-2399.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="19995,-2273 19995,-2390 20377,-2390 20377,-2273 19995,-2273"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20016" y="-2372.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think we can relate, I don't think it was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20013.5" y="-2357.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the purpose of Elie the author to have us relate</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20021.5" y="-2342.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to it, because I think if we relate to it, it kind</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20010" y="-2327.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of, it's something we can't do, because we never</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20001" y="-2312.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> had to go through it, we never had to see what has</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20014.5" y="-2297.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> seen, we never had to go through anything like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20166.5" y="-2282.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that.</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="20222,-2133 20222,-2175 20574,-2175 20574,-2133 20222,-2133"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20308" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 82 - STUDENT 12</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20350.5" y="-2142.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="20222,-2031 20222,-2133 20574,-2133 20574,-2031 20222,-2031"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20244.5" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think we can relate to it in a certain way</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20228" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because of things that have been happening in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20247.5" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> this world lately like all the shootings, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20230" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> thinks you can relate back to that with people</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20252" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> being fought for certain beliefs and that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20328" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> stuff, just like him.</text>

<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="20246,-1811 20246,-1868 20565,-1868 20565,-1811 20246,-1811"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20253.5" y="-1850.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Anybody disagree with that? Say it again,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20252" y="-1835.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> really loud. Speak loud, everybody! Really</text>

<!-- 86 -->
<g id="node121" class="node">
<title>86</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="19816,-2163 19816,-2205 20186,-2205 20186,-2163 19816,-2163"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19911" y="-2187.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 86 - STUDENT 13</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19953.5" y="-2172.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="19816,-2001 19816,-2163 20186,-2163 20186,-2001 19816,-2001"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19837" y="-2145.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I would say that I think you're right, it's very</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19873" y="-2130.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> hard for us to relate to the specific</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19852" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> experiences that he tries to tell us in the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19838.5" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> course of the book, but I think there is some</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19824" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> aspect that you can relate to, I think he was just</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19828.5" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> crying to get across, there's always going to be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19822" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pure evil and pure good in the world, this is what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19843" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pure evil can do, I think that's what he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19851.5" y="-2025.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> trying to relate to us. Because that's still</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19887" y="-2010.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> everywhere in our world today.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="19815,-2163 19815,-2163 20187,-2163 20187,-2163 19815,-2163"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="19815,-2000 19815,-2206 20187,-2206 20187,-2000 19815,-2000"/>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="19816,-1890 19816,-1932 20200,-1932 20200,-1890 19816,-1890"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19918" y="-1914.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 89 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19960.5" y="-1899.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="19816,-1773 19816,-1890 20200,-1890 20200,-1773 19816,-1773"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19822" y="-1872.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going off what Student 16 and Student 19 said: we</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19847.5" y="-1857.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> can and can't relate to it, we can relate to it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19822" y="-1842.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because we are all humans and that aspect of good</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19833.5" y="-1827.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and evil, like Duncan said, does happen, and we</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19838.5" y="-1812.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> can relate to it because we're put through this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19849.5" y="-1797.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> torture and death and disgusting -ness that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19893" y="-1782.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> these people were put through.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="19815,-1890 19815,-1890 20201,-1890 20201,-1890 19815,-1890"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="19815,-1772.5 19815,-1933.5 20201,-1933.5 20201,-1772.5 19815,-1772.5"/>

<title>83</title>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21305.5" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 83 - STUDENT 11</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21376" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="21217,-2733.5 21217,-2835.5 21574,-2835.5 21574,-2733.5 21217,-2733.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21237.5" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think we should relate to it, because if we</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21235.5" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't we just tend to forget about the whole</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21223" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> situation and just throw lies and not even think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21231.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about it and telling the story of the survivors</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21242" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> then there's a greater chance it's going to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21364.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happen.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="21216,-2835.5 21216,-2835.5 21575,-2835.5 21575,-2835.5 21216,-2835.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="21215.5,-2732.5 21215.5,-2878.5 21574.5,-2878.5 21574.5,-2732.5 21215.5,-2732.5"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21736.5" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 87 - STUDENT 16</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21807" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="21649,-2733.5 21649,-2835.5 22004,-2835.5 22004,-2733.5 21649,-2733.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21683.5" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Backing up all three of them, I feel like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21660.5" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> different people, what you've been through in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21655" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> your life through personal experiences you can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21659" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relate to some of this stuff but its never going</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21663.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to be to the certain level that someone like a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21698.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> survivor would be able to relate to.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="21648,-2835.5 21648,-2835.5 22005,-2835.5 22005,-2835.5 21648,-2835.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="21647.5,-2732.5 21647.5,-2878.5 22004.5,-2878.5 22004.5,-2732.5 21647.5,-2732.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 88 -->
<g id="node127" class="node">
<title>88</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21648,-2368 21648,-2410 22007,-2410 22007,-2368 21648,-2368"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21737.5" y="-2392.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 88 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21780" y="-2377.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21648,-2296 21648,-2368 22007,-2368 22007,-2296 21648,-2296"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21663.5" y="-2350.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think it's the fact that we can or can't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21654" y="-2335.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relate to it, I think it's more that he needs us to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21657.5" y="-2320.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relate to it because I don't see him writing it if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21684" y="-2305.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he didn't think you couldn't relate to it.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="21647,-2368 21647,-2368 22008,-2368 22008,-2368 21647,-2368"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="21646.5,-2295 21646.5,-2411 22007.5,-2411 22007.5,-2295 21646.5,-2295"/>
</g>

<!-- 91 -->
<g id="node128" class="node">
<title>91</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21634,-2148 21634,-2190 22022,-2190 22022,-2148 21634,-2148"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21742.5" y="-2172.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 91 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21780.5" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21634,-2016 21634,-2148 22022,-2148 22022,-2016 21634,-2016"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21663.5" y="-2130.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think we partially can relate, because when</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21649.5" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> this was happening, the author was a similar age</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21673" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to us and there's still shootings and things</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21668" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happening that show us all the bad that can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21653" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happen and I think that the main purpose of the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21640" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> story is to show us what can happen if we don't pay</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21669" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> attention to the outside world or see what's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21726" y="-2025.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happening and try to stop...</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="21633,-2148 21633,-2148 22023,-2148 22023,-2148 21633,-2148"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="21633,-2015 21633,-2191 22023,-2191 22023,-2015 21633,-2015"/>
</g>

<!-- 92 -->
<g id="node129" class="node">
<title>92</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21637,-1913 21637,-1955 22019,-1955 22019,-1913 21637,-1913"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21742.5" y="-1937.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 92 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21780.5" y="-1922.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21637,-1751 21637,-1913 22019,-1913 22019,-1751 21637,-1751"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21643" y="-1895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going back to what Student 5 and Student __ said,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21655.5" y="-1880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that if we try to relate we’re minimizing</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21661.5" y="-1865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it almost, because there's nothing in our lives</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21654.5" y="-1850.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that we really have seen ourselves or been in in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21669.5" y="-1835.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> those situations that can be like that. And I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21670.5" y="-1820.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> think because what Student 5 said "he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21676" y="-1805.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> someone our age", I think by showing the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21670" y="-1790.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> difference between our lives and their lives</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21649.5" y="-1775.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and showing that things that happened, they can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21797" y="-1760.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happen.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="21636,-1913 21636,-1913 22020,-1913 22020,-1913 21636,-1913"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="21636,-1750 21636,-1956 22020,-1956 22020,-1750 21636,-1750"/>
</g>

<!-- 94 -->
<g id="node130" class="node">
<title>94</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21640,-1662.5 21640,-1704.5 22016,-1704.5 22016,-1662.5 21640,-1662.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21742.5" y="-1687.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 94 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21780.5" y="-1672.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21640,-1545.5 21640,-1662.5 22016,-1662.5 22016,-1545.5 21640,-1545.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21702" y="-1645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think there's a different between</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21680.5" y="-1630.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relatability back to our lives and putting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21689.5" y="-1615.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> ourselves in their shoes. I think that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21646" y="-1600.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> something we all need to do and try to experience</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21696" y="-1585.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the emotions behind it, but we can't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21664" y="-1570.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> necessarily connect that to what we're living</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21660" y="-1555.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> day to day, I mean that's completely different.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="21639,-1662.5 21639,-1662.5 22017,-1662.5 22017,-1662.5 21639,-1662.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="21639,-1545 21639,-1706 22017,-1706 22017,-1545 21639,-1545"/>
</g>

<!-- 93 -->
<g id="node132" class="node">
<title>93</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="22064,-3082.5 22064,-3109.5 22458,-3109.5 22458,-3082.5 22064,-3082.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22182.5" y="-3092.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 93 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="22064,-2500.5 22064,-3082.5 22458,-3082.5 22458,-2500.5 22064,-2500.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22084.5" y="-3065.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I see a lot of connection in what you're saying to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22140.5" y="-3050.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the way we read fiction. We read</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22118" y="-3035.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> fiction..."Yep, that's a story, whatever",</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22088.5" y="-3020.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> but I caution you against reading this that way.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22082" y="-3005.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I want you to relate, I want you to put yourself in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22110.5" y="-2990.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Elie's shoes as much as you possibly can;</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22098.5" y="-2975.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> although it is painful for us to do and it's not</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22100.5" y="-2960.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> easy I want you to do that. That is why I am</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22086" y="-2945.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> teaching you this book. So try not to just read it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22095.5" y="-2930.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> on the surface, put yourself in it, put yourself</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22091" y="-2915.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> in the role of Elie. That's what he wants you to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22096" y="-2900.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> do, that's why it's first person! That's why he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22104.5" y="-2885.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> is the protagonist and the survivor and the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22104.5" y="-2870.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> author- it's all intentional. He wants you to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22095.5" y="-2855.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> experience it as awful as you possibly can, so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22070" y="-2840.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that you know how bad it is. So we made a comment</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22102" y="-2825.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yesterday, "no survivor could begin to tell a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22090" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> spark of the flame of the story", right? So even</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22114.5" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> though we're never gonna understand it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22098.5" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> completely or be able to put ourselves in the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22096" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> shoes completely, put yourselves in his shoes</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22079.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> as much as you possibly can, because if you know</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22082" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> how bad it was and you're feeling these emotions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22089" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that Elie makes you feel, then you're not gonna</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22091" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> let something like this happen. Like I told you,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22080" y="-2690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you guys are the future, you guys are gonna grow</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22073" y="-2675.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> up and you have to be the ones who don't hate, who</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22098" y="-2660.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't discriminate, those of you- you guys all</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22080.5" y="-2645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> have to be the ones who are accepting of tolerant</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22090" y="-2630.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and teach your friends and your children those</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22098" y="-2615.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> things so that nothing like this ever happens</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22085" y="-2600.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> again. So I caution you from just reading this on</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22100" y="-2585.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the surface. Read this deeper than any book</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22105" y="-2570.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you've read and will read this year and put</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22102.5" y="-2555.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yourself in his shoes, relate as much as you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22113" y="-2540.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> possibly can. Any comments, there? Any</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22100.5" y="-2525.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questions, there? Do you think it's gonna be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22218" y="-2510.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> hard to do?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="22063,-3082.5 22063,-3082.5 22459,-3082.5 22459,-3082.5 22063,-3082.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="22063,-2500 22063,-3111 22459,-3111 22459,-2500 22063,-2500"/>
</g>

<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="23325,-2805.5 23325,-2847.5 23686,-2847.5 23686,-2805.5 23325,-2805.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23415.5" y="-2830.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 97 - STUDENT 23</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23486.5" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NON</text>
<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="23325,-2763.5 23325,-2805.5 23686,-2805.5 23686,-2763.5 23325,-2763.5"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="22947.5" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What questions do you guys have from this</text>

<title>98</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="24351,-2835.5 24351,-2877.5 24723,-2877.5 24723,-2835.5 24351,-2835.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24451.5" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 98 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24517.5" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="24351,-2733.5 24351,-2835.5 24723,-2835.5 24723,-2733.5 24351,-2733.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24377" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think if you survived the holocaust, I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24370" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> think you still died, because you had to watch</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24360.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> other people die, you had to watch everyone you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24357" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> know die, you had to live there and go through it,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24364.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think anyone would ever [be the same] I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24387" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't think [the world would be the same</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24350,-2835.5 24350,-2835.5 24724,-2835.5 24724,-2835.5 24350,-2835.5"/>

<!-- 99 -->

<title>99</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24358,-2375 24358,-2417 24716,-2417 24716,-2375 24358,-2375"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24447" y="-2399.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 99 - STUDENT 16</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24489.5" y="-2384.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24358,-2288 24358,-2375 24716,-2375 24716,-2288 24358,-2288"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24370" y="-2357.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Backing up Student 9, In this story Elie had a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24370" y="-2342.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> very strong religion and he was very religious</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24364" y="-2327.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and he changed. He stopped believing, so I feel</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24371.5" y="-2312.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like we'd want to be the same but in reality it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24452.5" y="-2297.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> would change all of us.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24357,-2375 24357,-2375 24717,-2375 24717,-2375 24357,-2375"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24357,-2287.5 24357,-2418.5 24717,-2418.5 24717,-2287.5 24357,-2287.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 100 -->

<title>100</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24356,-2133 24356,-2175 24719,-2175 24719,-2133 24356,-2133"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24447.5" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 100 - STUDENT 6</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24490" y="-2142.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24356,-2031 24356,-2133 24719,-2133 24719,-2031 24356,-2031"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24362" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think, going on with what they said, the theme</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24378" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to struggle to maintain faith, it wouldn't be-</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24378" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> if you were going through what Elie did you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24380.5" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wouldn't be able to maintain your faith and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24381" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> stability to go through the whole thing and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24416" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> actually be the same coming out.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24355,-2133 24355,-2133 24720,-2133 24720,-2133 24355,-2133"/>

<title>101</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24559,-1913 24559,-1955 24941,-1955 24941,-1913 24559,-1913"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24660" y="-1937.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 101 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24702.5" y="-1922.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24559,-1751 24559,-1913 24941,-1913 24941,-1751 24559,-1751"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24591" y="-1895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think with an event like the holocaust, it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24589" y="-1880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> impossible to be the same person because if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24572.5" y="-1865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you're going through it you almost have to adapt</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24585.5" y="-1850.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to the conditions, you can't have a lot of time</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24570.5" y="-1835.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> for fun if they make you do work all the time or if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24565" y="-1820.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you don't have as much to eat and do anything you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24584" y="-1805.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> want to, because just from working there you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24594.5" y="-1790.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> would have to change your lifestyle which,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24602" y="-1775.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> after that [inaudible 00:28:46] normal or</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24672.5" y="-1760.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> accepted, you know?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24558,-1913 24558,-1913 24942,-1913 24942,-1913 24558,-1913"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24558,-1750 24558,-1956 24942,-1956 24942,-1750 24558,-1750"/>
</g>

<!-- 102 -->
<g id="node140" class="node">
<title>102</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24151,-1875 24151,-1917 24523,-1917 24523,-1875 24151,-1875"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24242.5" y="-1899.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 102 - STUDENT 18</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24289.5" y="-1884.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24151,-1788 24151,-1875 24523,-1875 24523,-1788 24151,-1788"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24186.5" y="-1857.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I agree, but I think that if I went through</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24165.5" y="-1842.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> something like the holocaust I would not really</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24162" y="-1827.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> give up my religion, I think it would be stronger</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24157" y="-1812.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because I would rely on it to help me get through</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24287" y="-1797.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the situation.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24150,-1875 24150,-1875 24524,-1875 24524,-1875 24150,-1875"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24150,-1787.5 24150,-1918.5 24524,-1918.5 24524,-1787.5 24150,-1787.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 104 -->
<g id="node141" class="node">
<title>104</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24192,-1655.5 24192,-1697.5 24564,-1697.5 24564,-1655.5 24192,-1655.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24283.5" y="-1680.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 104 - STUDENT 10</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24330.5" y="-1665.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24192,-1553.5 24192,-1655.5 24564,-1655.5 24564,-1553.5 24192,-1553.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24198" y="-1638.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Not a lot of people can say that they survived the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24215.5" y="-1623.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> holocaust so if you do still believe in religion</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24210.5" y="-1608.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> then you can have a more stronger future and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24237.5" y="-1593.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> saying that you survived something so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24201" y="-1578.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> traumatic that you can live your life the way you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24296.5" y="-1563.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wanted to afterwards.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24191,-1655.5 24191,-1655.5 24565,-1655.5 24565,-1655.5 24191,-1655.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24191,-1552.5 24191,-1698.5 24565,-1698.5 24565,-1552.5 24191,-1552.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 105 -->
<g id="node142" class="node">
<title>105</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24233,-1457.5 24233,-1499.5 24608,-1499.5 24608,-1457.5 24233,-1457.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24330.5" y="-1482.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 105 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24373" y="-1467.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24233,-1310.5 24233,-1457.5 24608,-1457.5 24608,-1310.5 24233,-1310.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24262.5" y="-1440.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think religion's only part of it. I feel like if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24239" y="-1425.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I was going to do something like that, you know, I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24263" y="-1410.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> can't- I can put myself in other shoes, but I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24258" y="-1395.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> can't actually put my life in there. I feel like,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24248" y="-1380.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you wouldn't want to feel, you wouldn't want to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24252" y="-1365.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> experience these emotions, you wouldn't want</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24250" y="-1350.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to think about it, I think you would just kind of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24251.5" y="-1335.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> go numb after you go through a certain period</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24262.5" y="-1320.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like that it's hard to come back afterwards.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24232,-1457.5 24232,-1457.5 24609,-1457.5 24609,-1457.5 24232,-1457.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24231.5,-1310 24231.5,-1501 24608.5,-1501 24608.5,-1310 24231.5,-1310"/>
</g>

<!-- 106 -->
<g id="node143" class="node">
<title>106</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24311,-1222.5 24311,-1264.5 24693,-1264.5 24693,-1222.5 24311,-1222.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24412" y="-1247.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 106 - STUDENT 6</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24454.5" y="-1232.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24311,-1105.5 24311,-1222.5 24693,-1222.5 24693,-1105.5 24311,-1105.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24358.5" y="-1205.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> After, to try to practice your religion, it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24322" y="-1190.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> would be hard because it would put flashbacks in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24347" y="-1175.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> your mind and maybe after awhile you can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24350.5" y="-1160.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> actually continue practicing your religion</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24335" y="-1145.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and then not have constant memories of what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24317" y="-1130.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happened when you were trying to survive and get</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24489.5" y="-1115.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> by.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24310,-1222.5 24310,-1222.5 24694,-1222.5 24694,-1222.5 24310,-1222.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24310,-1105 24310,-1266 24694,-1266 24694,-1105 24310,-1105"/>
</g>

<!-- 107 -->
<g id="node144" class="node">
<title>107</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24477,-1003 24477,-1045 24847,-1045 24847,-1003 24477,-1003"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24567.5" y="-1027.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 107 - STUDENT 18</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24614.5" y="-1012.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24477,-871 24477,-1003 24847,-1003 24847,-871 24477,-871"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24501.5" y="-985.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think one of the things a situation like this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24483" y="-970.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> would change a person, but I don't think it would</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24523.5" y="-955.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> necessarily change their practicing of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24498.5" y="-940.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> religion, because you can't blame everything</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24498" y="-925.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> on your God. This isn't their fault, bad things</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24488" y="-910.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> do happen in the world, obviously, but you can't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24498" y="-895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> just blame it all on your religion and just like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24612.5" y="-880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> give up on it.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24476,-1003 24476,-1003 24848,-1003 24848,-1003 24476,-1003"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24476,-870 24476,-1046 24848,-1046 24848,-870 24476,-870"/>
</g>

<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="24151,-931 24151,-958 24442,-958 24442,-931 24151,-931"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24157" y="-940.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">Can we get a comment on Student 18?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24150,-958 24150,-958 24443,-958 24443,-958 24150,-958"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24149.5,-930 24149.5,-986 24442.5,-986 24442.5,-930 24149.5,-930"/>
