<!-- 108 -->
<g id="node146" class="node">
<title>108</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="24983,-2827.5 24983,-2869.5 25353,-2869.5 25353,-2827.5 24983,-2827.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25073.5" y="-2852.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 108 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25148.5" y="-2837.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="24983,-2740.5 24983,-2827.5 25353,-2827.5 25353,-2740.5 24983,-2740.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24994" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going off what Student 18 said, religion is what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24998.5" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> kept these people living, because they had the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25007.5" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> right to pray even if- it wasn't allowed but it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24989" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was still keeping hope alive and hope that maybe</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25052" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they would survive and get out.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24982,-2827.5 24982,-2827.5 25354,-2827.5 25354,-2827.5 24982,-2827.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24982,-2740 24982,-2871 25354,-2871 25354,-2740 24982,-2740"/>
</g>

<!-- 109 -->
<g id="node147" class="node">
<title>109</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24985,-2383 24985,-2425 25345,-2425 25345,-2383 24985,-2383"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25070.5" y="-2407.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 109 - STUDENT 22</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25117.5" y="-2392.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24985,-2281 24985,-2383 25345,-2383 25345,-2281 24985,-2281"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24991" y="-2365.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going off of what Student 27 said, when they're</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25022" y="-2350.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> taken away they're separate from their</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24999" y="-2335.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> families and everybody they know so the only</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25000.5" y="-2320.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> thing they have to rely on is their religion, so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24997.5" y="-2305.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that kind of helps them get through the tough</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25140.5" y="-2290.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> times.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24984,-2383 24984,-2383 25346,-2383 25346,-2383 24984,-2383"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24984,-2280 24984,-2426 25346,-2426 25346,-2280 24984,-2280"/>
</g>

<!-- 110 -->
<g id="node148" class="node">
<title>110</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="25380,-2125 25380,-2152 25753,-2152 25753,-2125 25380,-2125"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25483.5" y="-2134.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 110 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="25380,-2053 25380,-2125 25753,-2125 25753,-2053 25380,-2053"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25386" y="-2107.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Could a person recover when he lost his faith. We</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25400.5" y="-2092.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> know that one of the big themes of the text is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25398.5" y="-2077.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> maintaining faith, so could a person recover if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25490" y="-2062.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he did lose his faith?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="25379,-2125 25379,-2125 25754,-2125 25754,-2125 25379,-2125"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="25378.5,-2052.5 25378.5,-2153.5 25753.5,-2153.5 25753.5,-2052.5 25378.5,-2052.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 112 -->
<g id="node149" class="node">
<title>112</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24983,-2133 24983,-2175 25344,-2175 25344,-2133 24983,-2133"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25069" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 112 - STUDENT 12</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25116" y="-2142.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="24983,-2031 24983,-2133 25344,-2133 25344,-2031 24983,-2031"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24997.5" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going off of what Student 19 said, many Jews</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25012.5" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> probably steered away from being Jewish</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25016.5" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because that's what got them into being</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24989" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> discriminated by Nazis. So, they could have run</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="24996" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> away from it, but also come steered back to it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25131" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> later on.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="24982,-2133 24982,-2133 25345,-2133 25345,-2133 24982,-2133"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="24981.5,-2030 24981.5,-2176 25344.5,-2176 25344.5,-2030 24981.5,-2030"/>
</g>

</g>
<!-- 111 -->
<g id="node150" class="node">
<title>111</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="26185,-2835.5 26185,-2877.5 26545,-2877.5 26545,-2835.5 26185,-2835.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26270.5" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 111 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26345.5" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="26185,-2733.5 26185,-2835.5 26545,-2835.5 26545,-2733.5 26185,-2733.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26195" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that you can, because there's examples</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26191" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> where, say, a person loses a family member and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26202.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> entirely loses their faith because they blame</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26196" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it on their god. And ten years later they'll turn</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26210.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> back to it through some kind of event that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26330" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happens.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="26184,-2835.5 26184,-2835.5 26546,-2835.5 26546,-2835.5 26184,-2835.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="26184,-2732.5 26184,-2878.5 26546,-2878.5 26546,-2732.5 26184,-2732.5"/>
</g>

<title>113</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="25795,-2820.5 25795,-2847.5 26149,-2847.5 26149,-2820.5 25795,-2820.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25889" y="-2830.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 113 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="25795,-2763.5 25795,-2820.5 26149,-2820.5 26149,-2763.5 25795,-2763.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25809.5" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Why does Elie show us that he, of all people,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25801" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> struggles to maintain his faith? What's want to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25925.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> prove to us?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="25794,-2820.5 25794,-2820.5 26150,-2820.5 26150,-2820.5 25794,-2820.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="25794,-2762.5 25794,-2848.5 26150,-2848.5 26150,-2762.5 25794,-2762.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 114 -->
<g id="node152" class="node">
<title>114</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="26608,-2835.5 26608,-2877.5 26979,-2877.5 26979,-2835.5 26608,-2835.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26703.5" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 114 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26774" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="26608,-2733.5 26608,-2835.5 26979,-2835.5 26979,-2733.5 26608,-2733.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26619" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think he's trying to show that, because he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26625.5" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> so religious and he lost his faith, it shows how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26614" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> traumatic it was, because it was bad enough that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26629.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> someone who's so deeply religious could lose</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26621.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> their faith. It would take a very bad experience</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26724" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> for that to happen.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="26607,-2835.5 26607,-2835.5 26980,-2835.5 26980,-2835.5 26607,-2835.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="26606.5,-2732.5 26606.5,-2878.5 26979.5,-2878.5 26979.5,-2732.5 26606.5,-2732.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 114--init10 -->
<!-- 114--114 -->
<g id="edge132" class="edge">
<title>114--114</title>
<path fill="none" stroke="#000000" d="M26987.6899,-2759.4004C26998.8415,-2770.5133 27005.5,-2785.8799 27005.5,-2805.5 27005.5,-2825.1201 26998.8415,-2840.4867 26987.6899,-2851.5996"/>
</g>
<!-- 115 -->
<g id="node153" class="node">
<title>115</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26606,-2413 26606,-2455 26997,-2455 26997,-2413 26606,-2413"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26707" y="-2437.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 115 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26754" y="-2422.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26606,-2251 26606,-2413 26997,-2413 26997,-2251 26606,-2251"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26617.5" y="-2395.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going off of what Student 5 said, for him to be one</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26630.5" y="-2380.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of the most religious people and pray everyday</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26612" y="-2365.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and go to the place where he did pray and go and- it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26621" y="-2350.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> just shows you how traumatic and how hard of an</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26631.5" y="-2335.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> experience it was for all the Jewish people and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26648" y="-2320.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> all the people that were religious that lost</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26648" y="-2305.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> their religion and lost their faith, that this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26643.5" y="-2290.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was probably the worst thing that had ever</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26651" y="-2275.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happened and would ever happen, to him</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26762" y="-2260.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> especially.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="26605,-2413 26605,-2413 26998,-2413 26998,-2413 26605,-2413"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="26604.5,-2250 26604.5,-2456 26997.5,-2456 26997.5,-2250 26604.5,-2250"/>
</g>

</g>
<!-- 116 -->
<g id="node154" class="node">
<title>116</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="27039,-2835.5 27039,-2877.5 27400,-2877.5 27400,-2835.5 27039,-2835.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27125" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 116 - STUDENT 24</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27200" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="27039,-2733.5 27039,-2835.5 27400,-2835.5 27400,-2733.5 27039,-2733.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27050.5" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think he had very high expectations for what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27045" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> his God could provide for him, through how this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27054" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> terrible thing could happen to him. He thinks</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27050.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that his God will get him through this or make</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27062.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> sure this is over, that's what he thinks. But</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27143.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that doesn't happen.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="27038,-2835.5 27038,-2835.5 27401,-2835.5 27401,-2835.5 27038,-2835.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="27037.5,-2732.5 27037.5,-2878.5 27400.5,-2878.5 27400.5,-2732.5 27037.5,-2732.5"/>
</g>
<!-- 116--init9 -->
<!-- 116--116 -->
<g id="edge135" class="edge">
<title>116--116</title>
<path fill="none" stroke="#000000" d="M27408.5161,-2758.8038C27419.7618,-2769.961 27426.5,-2785.5264 27426.5,-2805.5 27426.5,-2825.4736 27419.7618,-2841.039 27408.5161,-2852.1962"/>
</g>
<!-- 117 -->
<g id="node155" class="node">
<title>117</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="27460,-2842.5 27460,-2884.5 27817,-2884.5 27817,-2842.5 27460,-2842.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27548.5" y="-2867.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 117 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27619" y="-2852.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="27460,-2725.5 27460,-2842.5 27817,-2842.5 27817,-2725.5 27460,-2725.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27471.5" y="-2825.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think it really shows that even the strongest</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27497" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and most faithful still stumble and still</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27497" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> question and I think it's just natural to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27466" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> question when something so traumatic is going</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27474.5" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> on, but I think it also shows that you recover</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27495.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> from it, you can pull back, because you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27566" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> survived, you lived.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="27459,-2842.5 27459,-2842.5 27818,-2842.5 27818,-2842.5 27459,-2842.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="27458.5,-2725 27458.5,-2886 27817.5,-2886 27817.5,-2725 27458.5,-2725"/>
</g>

<!-- 117--117 -->

<title>117--117</title>

<!-- 118 -->
<g id="node156" class="node">
<title>118</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="28701,-2835.5 28701,-2877.5 29065,-2877.5 29065,-2835.5 28701,-2835.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28788.5" y="-2860.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 118 - STUDENT 16</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28863.5" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="28701,-2733.5 28701,-2835.5 29065,-2835.5 29065,-2733.5 28701,-2733.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28713.5" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going back to what Student 27 said, I feel like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28707" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you'd be able to recover but you wouldn't be the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28707.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> same, this was always going to be a part of your</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28716" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> life, it's always going to be on your mind after</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28723.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> life. And it's always going to be part of your</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28854" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> history.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="28700,-2835.5 28700,-2835.5 29066,-2835.5 29066,-2835.5 28700,-2835.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="28700,-2732.5 28700,-2878.5 29066,-2878.5 29066,-2732.5 28700,-2732.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 120 -->
<g id="node157" class="node">
<title>120</title>
<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="28299,-2842.5 28299,-2884.5 28665,-2884.5 28665,-2842.5 28299,-2842.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28392" y="-2867.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 120 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28463" y="-2852.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NON</text>
<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="28299,-2725.5 28299,-2842.5 28665,-2842.5 28665,-2725.5 28299,-2725.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28315" y="-2825.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I have a question for chapter 2 for page 24. It</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28305" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> says that in exchange for a gold watch they they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28323.5" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> discovered that they'd be getting out of the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28314" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> labor camp, but then just a couple lines below</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28316.5" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that it says that their confidence soared, why</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28308.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> do you think their confidence soared when they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="28308.5" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> really knew they were going to the labor camp?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="28298,-2842.5 28298,-2842.5 28666,-2842.5 28666,-2842.5 28298,-2842.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="28298,-2725 28298,-2886 28666,-2886 28666,-2725 28298,-2725"/>
</g>
<!-- 119 -->
<g id="node158" class="node">
<title>119</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="27878,-2902.5 27878,-2929.5 28263,-2929.5 28263,-2902.5 27878,-2902.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27987.5" y="-2912.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 119 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="27878,-2680.5 27878,-2902.5 28263,-2902.5 28263,-2680.5 27878,-2680.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27889.5" y="-2885.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> And remember why he includes this. He wants us</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27907" y="-2870.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to- he has a choice of what's in this book, it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27890" y="-2855.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> his experience, he can say whatever he wants, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27884" y="-2840.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> includes this, so we know how bad it was. Even the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27915.5" y="-2825.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> most faithful of the faithful lost their faith,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27887" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and therefore if we know that it was that bad then</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27900.5" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> we'll make sure nothing like this ever happens</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27896" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> again. It's all part of his goal. We know how bad</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27909" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it was, even the faithful lost their faith, then</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27923.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> hopefully we'll learn from that. We'll see</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27891" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "Wow! It must have been pretty bad", and not let</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27896" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> anything like this happen again. So I do want to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27902" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> talk about chapter 2. Chapter 2 is interesting.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27894" y="-2690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What are your thoughts on chapter 2? Anything.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="27877,-2902.5 27877,-2902.5 28264,-2902.5 28264,-2902.5 27877,-2902.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="27876.5,-2680 27876.5,-2931 28263.5,-2931 28263.5,-2680 27876.5,-2680"/>
</g>
<!-- 121 -->
<g id="node159" class="node">
<title>121</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="29544,-2820.5 29544,-2862.5 29899,-2862.5 29899,-2820.5 29544,-2820.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29631.5" y="-2845.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 121 - STUDENT 6</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29702" y="-2830.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="29544,-2748.5 29544,-2820.5 29899,-2820.5 29899,-2748.5 29544,-2748.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29550" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think because it's better than going right to a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29571.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> place where you're killed immediately, at</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29553" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> least you get to live a little bit longer or might</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29690.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> survive.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="29543,-2820.5 29543,-2820.5 29900,-2820.5 29900,-2820.5 29543,-2820.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="29542.5,-2747.5 29542.5,-2863.5 29899.5,-2863.5 29899.5,-2747.5 29542.5,-2747.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 121--121 -->
<g id="edge141" class="edge">
<title>121--121</title>
<path fill="none" stroke="#000000" d="M29809.8162,-2743.4508C29868.5206,-2726.3101 29925.5,-2746.9932 29925.5,-2805.5 29925.5,-2864.0068 29868.5206,-2884.6899 29809.8162,-2867.5492"/>
</g>
<!-- 122 -->
<g id="node160" class="node">
<title>122</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="29125,-2895.5 29125,-2922.5 29507,-2922.5 29507,-2895.5 29125,-2895.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29233" y="-2905.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 122 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="29125,-2688.5 29125,-2895.5 29507,-2895.5 29507,-2688.5 29125,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29141.5" y="-2878.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think they knew. They didn't know. What</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29146.5" y="-2863.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was happening at this time was unfathomable,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29147" y="-2848.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> nothing like this had ever happened before, so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29153.5" y="-2833.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> they didn't know what being in a labor camp</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29140.5" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> meant. They just thought it meant "you're going</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29143.5" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to do work for the war effort" and I think that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29154.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it and the other things they were thinking is</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29131" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> "The Germans are trying to keep us away from the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29147.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> war", but what is happening is unfathomable I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29143.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't think they ever would have imagined that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29136.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that's what they were going to do. So I think that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29146" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> answers your question. But it does seem- what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="29257.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> literary device?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="29124,-2895.5 29124,-2895.5 29508,-2895.5 29508,-2895.5 29124,-2895.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="29124,-2687.5 29124,-2923.5 29508,-2923.5 29508,-2687.5 29124,-2687.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="30791" y="-2822.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 123 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="30861.5" y="-2807.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="30857" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">Ironic.</text>
